attributes.action: introduce legislation to replace the monarchy with a democratically elected head of state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The institution of the monarchy is undemocratic.  The principle of heredity infects and dilutes our democratic culture and weakens our democratic institutions.  The people are deeply concerned about the prospect of King Charles III and want a choice.  Only a republic can give them that choice.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " introduce legislation to replace the monarchy with a democratically elected head of state."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12461.asp
